summary: Make Lightning Storm viable! I made this mod simply to make Lightning Storm viable over Thunderbolt. What this mod does is increase the damage of Lightning Storm to provide more DPS than Thunderbolt.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][u][b][color=#6d9eeb][size=5]Why did I Make this Mod?[/size][/color][/b][/u]
[size=3]I made this mod simply to make Lightning Storm viable over Thunderbolt. What this mod does is increase the damage of Lightning Storm to provide more DPS than Thunderbolt.

[/size][/font]Here is the math:

Lightning storm DPS without mod: 112
Thunderbolt DPS: 360
Lightning Storm DPS with mod: 448 (112*4)
author: Gushis
